name: Gigabit vs The Cyberaptors
description:
Play as Gigabit, a 4 legged repair / battle droid. Unlock the secretes of your "ship" as you explore your environment and upgrade your abilities. Defeat the evil Cyber Raptors to regain control.

This game was made for the MVM XVI Game Jam in 1 month.

Sound credit goes to Discord name ILoveOov.
